data.author: lenku

changelog.release_notes: - Fixed bug that caused the seconds counter to be permanently enabled. (Thank you to lrspncr for reporting the bug, figuring out what was wrong, and providing a solution.)

- Finally fixed nasty bug for Aplite versions that caused very inaccurate checkpoint indicators!
- Added countdown timer for next checkpoint that can be toggled via configuration page
- Tweaked variable names and removed first load in place of a better system
- Reformatted code
- Stability and optimisation improvements

- Fixed problem with adding date after configuration
- Optimised code
- Fixed bug with writing time and checkpoint to watchface on first-load

- Removed hardcoded preferences for the Aplite platform (unintentional)
- Optimised code
- Fixed fatal battery icon bug (finally)
- Added seconds ticker and date formats to configuration page
- Re-added configuration page (will only open for Pebble Times)
- Merged the Aplite and Basalt versions into 1 app, rather than 2 separate apps.

data.description:
The Ingress-inspired watchface for the Pebble and Pebble Time.

An agent's best friend! Always available on their wrist can be the most simple and essential of information one might need when going Ingressing. Maybe you just want to show your faction's colours, and be proud of where you belong. Either way, IngressFace can let you do it.

If you have never heard of Ingress, you should really check it out. It's augmented-reality at its finest! Anyone can play!

Features:
- Current time
- Current date
- Next checkpoint (according to the user's timezone)
- Displayed battery percentage
- Colour/icon schemes according to your chosen faction
- Choice between date formats and/or use of a seconds ticker
- Choice between countdown or simple time display for next checkpoint

Credit for the 3 icons loaded in the bottom right corner of the watchface goes to cr0ybot and their fantastic skills. Very high-quality and large versions of all sorts of Ingress logos can be found on their GitHub (https://github.com/cr0ybot/ingress-logos). The icons used in this watchface are modifications of cr0ybot's.
data.title: IngressFace
